body.name: i Phone Charger Fast Charging- 20W USB C Wall Charger Block with 6Ft Charger Cord [MFi Certified] Compatible with i Phone 14/13/12/11/X Series, i Pad & More [3Pack]

features: [Fast Charger] This charger supports 20W charging via PD (Power Delivery), meaning you can charge your phone to 58% in just half an hour, which is 3X faster than an original 5W charger.
[6Ft Long Charger Cord] This attached cord is 6ft long. Without being glued to the wall while charging, now you can use and charge your phone while staying comfortable on your bed or sofa.

[Superior Safety] Conforms to the ETL safety standard, this charger fast charging features a total of 10 safety features including short-circuit protection, high-voltage protection, and temperature control so that you can rest easy while charging your devices.
[What You Get] 3 Pack of 20W Charger with 6ft Charging Cable, our worry-free 24-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page MFi Certified completely MFi Certified and designed to work flawlessly with i· Phone, i· Pad and i· Pod. 20W Power Delivery supports Power Delivery technology to power a wide range of Light· ning devices at fast speed. Incredibly Tough features a tough construction to protect against scratches, scrapes, bumps and drops. 10,000 Bend Lifespan lab-tested to withstand 30,000 bends without breaking-can last 10 times longer than lesser cables. Next page Why Choose Us? 1 Safe 2 Fast 3 Tough 4 Durable

Compatibility iP 14 / 14 pro / 14 plus / 14 pro max / 13 / 13 Pro / 13 Pro Max / 13 mini /12 / 12 Pro / 12 Pro Max / 12 mini /11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / Xs Max / Xr / Xs -Fast Charging Speed iP 8 / 8Plus / 7 / 7plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 / SE (2016) / SE2 (2020) -Limited Charging Speed i Pad Pro 9.7 inch (2016) / 10.5 inch (2017) / 12.9 inch (2017) i Pad 9.7 inch (2017) / 9.7 inch (2018) / 10.2 inch (2019,7th generation) /10.2 inch (2020,8th generation) i Pad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4 (2015) / mini 5 (2019), i Pad Air / Air 2 / Air 3 (2019) and more Note: 1- Please make sure your device doesn’t need more than a 20W charger. 2- If you are charging something else that might not charge at up to 20W – like an Air· Pods, it’ll charge at its max speed. Basically, it is backwards compatible.

Can this charger charge an iP 14 at full speed? Yes. It can charge an iP 14 to 58% in just half an hour. Does this charger work on i Pad 8th generation? Yes. What are the specs of this charger? Input: 100-240V~0.5A 50-60Hz Output: 5V ⎓ 3A, 9V ⎓ 2.22A, 12V ⎓ 1.67A Max. Power: 20W What can be provided if any problem arises? Within 2 years of receipt of delivery, for any quality issue, simply reach us and we’ll give you a new product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far they work great . Fast charging and good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are great! Great price, very sturdy charge ports and speedy charging 👍🏼 absolutely nothing wrong with these chargers and awesome price for 3 !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: I’m tired of how fast I go through chargers and wall adapters so I definitely like the price of 4. They work great and fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Found this product on sale for $10. Can’t beat the price, quick charging, durable & nice length. 10/10 recommend as this is my second time purchasing from this company. (I lose lots of chargers 🤦🏻‍♀️)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were right on time. I gave it 4 star only because one of the charging plugs doesn't work but other than that, these are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Skeptical of the price and if these are actual fast charging. Glad I purchased though! Great product, great quality, reliable! I will purchase these again in the future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product works great - getting extra chargers allows us to keep them in the most used areas of the house. The cord length is a blessing compared to others we've used!
